title: league client failed loading downloads
body: anyone having idea of what to do? my client update like 4000 filed and pop out a screen that shows update failed. i tried both legacy client and alpha, both did not successfully update my client. i really need help!!!

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your patcher's connection to our patching servers is relatively poor. I'd recommend checking our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) out for a list of steps that should resolve this for you.

Let me know if this helped.
